attributes.review: The app is always crashing and won’t stay open for more than 30 secs on my phone. Whenever you press a button in the app it takes so long to register it’s honestly so aggravating to deal with half the time I want to chuck my phone across the room. Truly awful. 🤬😡
attributes.title: Save the trouble and do NOT Download

attributes.review: I wanted to see what the hype of this app was. All the boomers were talking about it so I decided to download it to be “hip” like them. Turns out it was a great mistake. Now I have random Cheetos appearing all over my humble abode. You would think that it would be a good thing, considering they are a delicious snack; however, they all resemble mr. tiny hands. I am now living in fear. Someone help.
attributes.title: Boomer locator

attributes.review: This app turned me into a monkey and now I have to get sent to the zoo or a research facility my family doesn’t believe that I’m me they think I ran away I hate this app so much it’s horrible don’t get it unless you want to be turned into a monkey without your permission like me 😔🙊 this is a true story but I have to go now goodbye.  🍌🍌🍇🍇🥝🥝🍊🍊🍉🍉🍓🍓🍒🍒🍎🍎
attributes.title: Turned me into a monkey😐

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would be a fun app for my kids since they were banned from the pbs kids app and at first it took over a week to download and once it was downloaded I handed it to my kids to play and they both went into cardiac arrest upon seeing Donald Trumps face, we soon rushed into the ER after that, DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. #dumptrump2020
attributes.title: Don’t Download This 🚨🚨

attributes.review: The app was slow and gave me a virus on my phone and couldn’t use it for 2 weeks don’t purchase this app unless you want a virus that takes $1000 to fix I am feed up with it and it always has a crusty Cheeto on the page it looks so shriveled up and disgusting if I could rate it a 0/5 I would gladly do that
attributes.title: Horrible causes virus

attributes.review: This app ruined my will to live. Not only did it break my phone during the downloading process, leaving me phone less for days, but it then stole all of my data. The terms of service are suspicious, I think it may be chinese spyware. I have no proof of this but I am taking a note from our great president who doesn’t believe in facts.
attributes.title: Ungodly

attributes.review: First the download load look 3 days and took 2.5 gbts of my phone storage. But hen I clicked on the app Russian porn with games start popping up spamming my front screen. That same day got a text if to see what my age was and was told they like little boys deleted app and got a new phone do not recommend
attributes.title: Glitches and put a virus on my phone
